name: Patlabor: The Game: Taikenban Ver. 1.0
overview: A demo of a game that would be titled "Patlabor - The Game", which was bundled with copies of the Playstation game "Silent Mobius". In spite of being based on the same IP and being a PlayStation game, the game title "Patlabor - Game Edition", released in 2000, is NOT this game. It is a more straightforward, arcade-esque robot combat game using Production I.G. art.
